overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active social media presence across multiple platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total following of 3,580. Engagement levels vary by platform, with a strong emphasis on academic and research-related content, particularly in the fields of disinformation and computational social science.

contentThemes.description: Updates on new research papers, grants, and projects.
Job postings and research opportunities for students and professionals.
Participation in conferences and presentations on disinformation studies.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts across all platforms to maintain engagement.
Leverage visuals and infographics to enhance post engagement, especially on LinkedIn.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon has a smaller following compared to other platforms but sees consistent engagement on research-related topics.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is the most engaging platform with high interaction on professional and research announcements.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
